parameters:
"This is Makoto's house. It's still an incredible mansion. I
remember going inside when I was little, and they had a lot
of servants."

"I wonder if Makoto has already gone home? Sigh, what could
she be doing now..."
"I wonder if Makoto will forgive me..."

"A trip with friends, huh... I'd like to go on a trip with
Makoto too... *sigh*"

"Haa... Mom is always so noisy... I wish she'd be a bit
quieter... grumble grumble grumble..."
"Good morning, Makoto! Sorry, I got out a little late!"

"Good morning, Mamoru! ...You look really sleepy. Did you
oversleep or something?"

"No, actually, I completely forgot about my homework. I was
up late last night, frantically solving the problems."

"Hey, hey, didn't I tell you to plan ahead? You never
change, Mamoru."

"Well, before I knew it, the break was over. Oh, but more
importantly, about yesterday's lunch..."

This girl's name is \c[10]Asahi Makoto\c[0]. She lives in
the mansion next door, the so-called childhood friend.
Despite her boyish name, she has a surprisingly large chest.

Perhaps because of her foreign heritage, her eyes and hair
have a reddish tint. She has a handsome face that could
rival any boy's, and she excels in both academics and
sports. To top it off, her family is extremely wealthy.

If we weren't childhood friends, I probably wouldn't even be
known by name to her. Thinking about it, becoming friends
with Makoto might be almost a miracle.

We go to the same school, so we always walk there together
in the morning. We have casual conversations and walk to
school while laughing. It's the happiest time of my
otherwise ordinary day.

But the time we can spend together is only while we're on
our way to school. Once we get to school, we can't talk
anymore. Because...

"To oversleep again after yesterday! I need to hurry or I'll
be late for school!"

"Makoto seems to have gone ahead... I didn't get a reply to
my message yesterday either..."

"Did I say something that hurtful...? Could it be that
Makoto was expecting my confession...?"

"No, that can't be it... I should head to school quickly
too!"

"It seems Makoto went ahead... I wonder what happened to
her..."

(Could it be that what I saw yesterday wasn't a mistake? Did
Makoto really go to Suzuki's house...)

"No, it must be my imagination. Makoto went to the dojo!
...I need to hurry to school too."

When I entered the classroom, Makoto was there, having
arrived at school on time. I wanted to talk to her, even if
just a little, but as usual, her entourage made it
impossible to get close.

"Sigh, I couldn't talk to Makoto today either. Can't be
helped... I guess I'll go home..."

In the Free Action Part, you can use your smartphone. The
smartphone allows you to call a taxi, and you can also view
two erotic sites. It can be used from the menu screen, so
please give it a try.

(I wonder if I can go to school with Makoto today...? But we
haven't quite made up yet, so it might still be
difficult...)

"Oh, good morning Makoto! Were you by any chance waiting for
me?"

"Do you think there's any other reason I'd be here? Come on,
let's go to school together."

Having half given up on the idea, I was truly happy to be
able to go to school with Makoto after such a long time. But
this stroke of luck wasn't the end of it.

"Today flew by in the blink of an eye. Maybe it's because I
had a fun time going to school with Makoto?"

(I really want to spend the after-school time together
too... but that would be asking for too much, wouldn't it?)

"...Oops. Got lost in thought at the exit. Well then, I
should hurry home and maybe do some homework."

"This is Makoto's house. It's still an incredible mansion. I
remember going inside when I was little, and they had a lot
of servants."

"I wonder if Makoto has already gone home? Sigh, what could
she be doing now..."
"I wonder if Makoto will forgive me..."

"Come to think of it, I haven't visited Makoto's house even
once this year. I'd love to hang out together again..."

"This is Makoto's house. It's still an amazing mansion. I've
been inside when I was little, and they had a lot of
servants."

"I wonder if Makoto has already gone home? Sigh, what could
she be doing now..."
"I wonder if Makoto will forgive me..."

"Come to think of it, I haven't visited Makoto's house even
once this year. I'd like to hang out together again..."

"Wow, it's really clear out. Yesterday's heavy rain seems
like a lie... I wonder if Makoto is around today?"
"Good morning, Makoto! You were waiting for me, huh!"

"Good morning, Mamoru. I'm glad you came out early since the
sunlight is so strong today."

"With the rain clouds gone, the sunlight must be stronger
today. Oh, by the way... were you okay after that? Did you
manage to get home alright?"

"After that?... Oh, you mean after it started raining? I
always carry a folding umbrella with me, so it wasn't a
problem."

"I-I see! That's good then! I used my bag as a makeshift
umbrella, but by the time I got home, even my underwear was
soaked!"

"Mamoru, you tend to forget your umbrella anyway, so it
would be better if you carried a folding umbrella with you."

"Right, speaking of folding umbrellas, I remembered seeing a
nice one at the department store the other day..."

I accidentally let something slip and asked something I
shouldn't have. Makoto went into that place alone without
even consulting me. She probably doesn't want anyone to know
she went down there.

Unless Makoto talks about it herself, I don't plan to ask.
But the fact that the man with sunglasses was there means
that Suzuki, being the master, must have been in that
underground facility as well.

I thought I had to somehow put an end to the relationship
between Makoto and Suzuki. But I couldn't think of any
concrete way to do it, and even though I was walking to
school with Makoto, I couldn't focus much on the
conversation.

"Makoto's Golden Week schedule was almost full, but today we
can play together...!"

"I won't make the same mistake as in the infirmary. Today is
the day I will confess to Makoto...!"

"Good morning, Mamoru. It's such nice weather today. It's
the perfect day to go out and play."

"Hm? I usually wear boyish clothes, so today I tried wearing
a skirt... Does it look strange?"

"No, not at all! It suits you really well! You look very
cute, Makoto!"
"C-cute...♡ Don't say it so loudly, you're making me blush♡"

(She's blushing and looking embarrassed. So cute. Talking
with Makoto always makes me feel so happy.)
"...Mamoru? You're spacing out, are you okay?"

"Eh!? O-of course, I'm fine! So, shall we get going? We're
going to have lots of fun today～!"

"Makoto's Golden Week schedule was almost full, but today we
can play together...!"

"I won't make the same mistake as in the infirmary. Today is
the day I will confess to Makoto...!"

"Good morning, Mamoru. It's really nice weather today. It's
the perfect day to go out and play."

"Hm? Oh... I've been wearing skirts a lot lately. How is it?
Do I look a bit more feminine?"

"It suits you very well! You should wear that kind of
clothes more often!"

"Is that so, it suits me? That's good. I was worried I might
get laughed at."

"(Even Makoto's troubled face is cute. Talking with Makoto
always makes me feel so happy.)"
"...Mamoru? You're spacing out, are you okay?"

"Eh!? O-of course, I'm fine! Well then, shall we get going?
We're going to have lots of fun today~!"

"I can't believe I won't get to play even for a day...
During Golden Week, I'm always on trips with friends..."

"I was planning to spend a lot of time with Makoto and...
confess on the last day..."

"I really should have asked her out in advance... I'm really
not good at planning... Hahaha..."

"...I've got nothing to do during Golden Week, so maybe I'll
just go for a walk or something... Sigh"

"Looks like Makoto went ahead today too... We couldn't hang
out even once during the holidays, it's really been
rough..."

"Sigh... Complaining here won't help... I should head to
school quickly..."

"Makoto's Golden Week schedule was almost full, but today we
can play together...!"

"I won't make the same mistake as in the infirmary. Today is
the day I will confess to Makoto...!"

"Good morning, Mamoru. It's really nice weather today. It's
the perfect day to go out and play."

"Hm? I usually wear boyish clothes, so today I tried wearing
a skirt... Does it look strange?"

"No, not at all! It suits you really well! You look very
cute, Makoto!"
"C-cute...♡ Don't say it so loudly, you're making me blush♡"

(She's blushing and looking embarrassed. So cute. Talking
with Makoto really does make me feel happy.)
"...Mamoru? You're spacing out, are you okay?"

"Eh!? O-of course, I'm fine! Well then, shall we get going?
We're going to have lots of fun today～!"

"Makoto's Golden Week schedule was almost full, but today we
can play together...!"

"I won't make the same mistake as in the infirmary. Today, I
will definitely confess to Makoto...!"

"Good morning, Mamoru. It's really nice weather today. It's
the perfect day to go out and play."

"Hm? I usually wear boyish clothes, so today I tried wearing
a skirt... Does it look strange?"

"No, not at all! It suits you really well! You look very
cute, Makoto!"
"C-cute...♡ Don't say it so loudly, you're making me blush♡"

(She's blushing and looking embarrassed. So cute. Talking
with Makoto always makes me feel so happy.)
"...Mamoru? You're spacing out, are you okay?"

"Eh!? O-of course, I'm fine! Well then, shall we get going?
We're going to have lots of fun today～!"
"Good morning, Makoto! The weather is nice today, isn't it?"

"Good morning, Mamoru. It really is a beautiful day. I made
a lunchbox for you, so let's eat outside today♡"

"Makoto's homemade lunchbox!? Awesome, I'm really looking
forward to lunch!"

Ever since we started dating, we've been going to school
together more closely. We make casual conversation and head
to school holding hands. That alone was the best, but there
were also various other changes.
"Makoto... she's not here... Maybe she went ahead again..."

(Lately, things have been awkward with Makoto. If it was
going to come to this, maybe I should have confessed my
feelings.)

"They say hindsight is 20/20, that must be about me right
now. Sigh... I need to get to school..."

"Seriously, man! I saw the Prince and Suzuki walking
together in the downtown area the other day!"

"By 'Prince', you mean Asahi, right? No way! Suzuki and
Asahi are known to not get along at all."

"I couldn't believe my eyes at first either! But they were
walking together! Asahi looked displeased, but she seemed to
be listening to him!"

"And after wandering around downtown for a bit, they went
into this huge building that looked like a hotel!"

"That's impossible! You must've seen it wrong! Maybe Suzuki
picked up some delinquent girl instead?"

"No way, that was definitely Asahi! I saw it with my own
eyes, no mistake! Come on, believe me!"

parameters.name: 魔王魂 効果音 チャイム03

parameters:
(Could that story from before be true... Makoto and Suzuki
walking together...)

(Isn't Makoto supposed to be helping out at the dojo in the
downtown area? Why would she be with Suzuki?)

(...No, it must have been a mistake by that student. Those
two are like cats and dogs. It's impossible for them to be
together.)

In the end, I still didn't get to talk to Makoto today, and
the afternoon classes ended. Makoto seemed to be enjoying
her day with her entourage, but she also looked a bit tired.

But I convinced myself that it was because she was busy with
her help work. It might have been something to do with
Suzuki. However, to keep my composure, I didn't think any
further than that.
"Huh? She's not here, Makoto... Did she go ahead today...?"

(We had fun playing together last week, and I thought we had
made up...)

(But now that I think about it, Makoto was acting a bit
strange last week. It was as if she wanted to forget
something and was immersing herself in the games.)

"Could it be because of Suzuki... But even if I ask Makoto,
I doubt she'll talk about it honestly..."

"...No point in thinking about it here. I should head to
school too."

"Hey, do you know? There was this guy who got suspended on
his first day after transferring, right? I heard he got
injured last Monday."

"Apparently, his house suddenly lost power. He was walking
around in the dark in his underwear and missed a step on the
stairs."

"The transfer student's name was Suzuki, wasn't it? That guy
is really clumsy. He should've just used a flashlight."

"But how do you know all this? Did you hear it directly from
him?"

"No way. A friend of mine happened to see it. Some tough-
looking guy was explaining the story to the paramedics."

"The Suzuki guy himself was being carried on a stretcher in
just his underwear. He was holding his ankle and wailing
like a child, they say."

"For a delinquent, he sure is pathetic. But he was an
unpleasant guy, so it serves him right."

I never imagined Suzuki would get injured. The cause was
clearly the power outage I caused, and I felt a slight sense
of guilt towards Suzuki.

But to save Makoto, I had no other choice. According to the
boys' conversation, it doesn't seem like a serious injury.
That's at least a relief.

I hope nothing else happens, but Suzuki seems to hold
grudges, and once his leg heals, he might do something to
Makoto again.

I should stay on guard. With that thought, I tightened my
relaxed vigilance and didn't take my eyes off Makoto for the
entire day, ready for anything that might happen.

(I'm really glad I was able to help Makoto yesterday... but
I think I'll pass on going to the next town over again...)

(Huh? It's rare for Makoto to come out later than me. Oh,
that's right. I woke up earlier than usual today.)

"You surprised me... Good morning, Mamoru! You're quite
early today. I never thought you'd leave home before me."

"Actually, I slept really well last night! Thanks to that, I
was able to wake up without oversleeping!"

"Huh, that's unusual since you always say you're sleep-
deprived. Did something good happen?"

"Eh!? N-no, not really~? I just happened to sleep well! More
importantly, Makoto... would it be okay if we walked to
school together?"

"...Of course! That's a given! Right! Since we left early
today, let's take our time getting to school."

Although I was anxious that she might refuse before I asked,
it seems Makoto was planning to walk to school with me from
the start. Thanks to waking up early this morning, I was
able to spend more time with Makoto than usual.

"Walking to school with Makoto today was really fun. Maybe
waking up early once in a while isn't such a bad idea."

(That's right. Maybe I'll try going to bed early today too.
That way, I can spend more time with Makoto tomorrow.)

"Alright, I'll finish my homework as soon as I get home.
I'll take a bath early and... Hm?"

"It's rare to get a phone call. I wonder who it is... Eh,
Makoto!?"

"Eh? No, I was just wondering if you'd like to hang out, so
I called..."

(Ah, it was an invitation to hang out! I thought for sure
something had happened with Suzuki...)
"N-no! I just thought it was rare for Makoto to call me!"

"Is that so? But now that you mention it, I guess I don't
call very often, do I?"

"So... um... what do you think? If you're free, would you
like to hang out?"

"Of course I'll hang out! Where are you now? The shopping
district? Got it! I'll head over there right away! See you
later then!"

(Yes! I get to hang out with Makoto again! Today is really a
good day! I have to hurry to the shopping district!)

When we met up, we had fun roaming the bustling streets just
like last week. Then, in the mornings, I would walk to
school slowly with Makoto, and after school, we spent our
days playing together secretly, away from our usual group of
friends.

While we were playing, I thought about asking about Suzuki
several times, but every time I brought up his name, Makoto
skillfully changed the subject. It seems she really didn't
want to talk to me about Suzuki.

I didn't know when Suzuki might try something with Makoto
again, but at least on the days we played together like
this, nothing should happen. I decided not to ask about
Suzuki anymore and focused on having fun.

(Yes! I can't believe I get to play with Makoto! Today is
really a good day! I have to hurry to the shopping
district!)

Hurrying to meet up with Makoto, we headed to the
entertainment district to play. I never imagined I'd get to
spend the afternoon with Makoto. It's been a day full of
good things since we walked to school together this morning.

We continued to play, forgetting the time, and before we
knew it, it was dark outside. We chatted side by side as we
walked home together, and at the end of the day, Makoto
invited me to play again tomorrow.

Of course, I immediately agreed with enthusiasm. Then, as if
it were a daily routine, I continued to hang out with
Makoto, and a week flew by in no time.

In the end, I wasn't able to ask Makoto about the incident
in the neighboring town, but at that time, I thought I could
take my time and ask her later. Little did I know, we were
already in the worst situation, and I was oblivious to it.

"Makoto is... not here... Maybe she doesn't want to go to
school with me anymore..."

"I want to mend our relationship by Golden Week, but it
might be difficult..."

"No, it's too early to give up... I need to get to school
quickly if I want to make up with her..."

"Seriously! I saw Prince and Suzuki walking together in the
downtown area the other day!"

"By Prince, you mean Asahi, right? No way! Suzuki and Asahi
are known to have a bad relationship."

"I doubted my eyes at first too! But they were walking close
together! Asahi looked reluctant, but she seemed to be
listening to him!"

"After wandering around downtown for a while, they entered a
huge building that looked like a hotel!"

"That's impossible! You must've seen it wrong! Maybe Suzuki
picked up some delinquent girl instead?"

"No way, that was definitely Asahi! I saw it with my own
eyes, no mistake! Come on, believe me!"

parameters.name: 魔王魂 効果音 チャイム03

parameters:
(Could that story from earlier be true... that Makoto and
Suzuki were walking together...)

(Isn't Makoto supposed to be helping out at the dojo in the
downtown area? Why would she be with someone like Suzuki?)

(...No, it must be a mistake by that student. Those two are
like cats and dogs. It's impossible for them to be
together.)

In the end, I went through the day without talking to Makoto
again. She seemed to be enjoying her day with her friends,
but she also looked a bit tired.

But I convinced myself that it was because she was busy with
the dojo. It might have been something with Suzuki. However,
to keep my composure, I didn't think any further than that.

"Makoto is... not here... Maybe she doesn't want to go to
school with me anymore..."

"I want to mend our relationship by Golden Week, but it
might be difficult..."

"No, it's too early to give up... I need to get to school
quickly if I want to make up with her..."

parameters.name: 魔王魂 効果音 チャイム03

parameters:
"Sigh... It's already lunch break... At this rate, it looks
like I won't get to talk to Makoto today either..."

(It's not like we started not talking at school today, but
still, not being able to talk even once throughout the day
is tough...)

(...No good. My mood just keeps getting worse. Maybe I
should eat lunch outside for a change of pace today.)

"I saw it, man! Asahi was in the next town over! And she was
with that suspended Suzuki!"

"Asahi was in the next town? And with that Suzuki? Are you
sure you didn't see wrong? Asahi wouldn't go to a town like
that."

"I'm telling you it's true! I only saw her from behind, but
her hair was reddish, and I'm sure it was Asahi!"

"She was walking side by side with Suzuki in her uniform! I
saw them enter a tavern together!"

"I've peeked inside that tavern before, you know! Sometimes
they have orgies in there!"

"I bet Asahi got it on with a bunch of guys too! Ahh! I wish
I could try it just once!"

"Hey, hey... keep your voice down...! If the girls hear us,
we'll be slaughtered..."

Such a ridiculous story about Makoto being involved in an
orgy. She's the most serious student in this school. There's
no way she would go to a town known as a hangout for
delinquents.

Even last Monday, when she was seen walking towards the next
town, it was because she was going to a different town
beyond it. That student must have mistaken someone with a
similar hair color for Makoto.

If not, then he's definitely lying. Makoto told me over the
phone that she wasn't in the next town. So there's no way
she could have been there...

"Good morning, Makoto! It's nice weather again today... huh?
What's that?"
"Makoto... isn't here... Is she running late today...?"

"Any messages on my smartphone... oh, there's one. What's
this? 'I have some errands, so I'll go ahead today!'?"

"So, I see... Makoto went ahead without me... Can't be
helped... I should head to school quickly too."

parameters.name: 魔王魂 効果音 チャイム03

parameters:
"Phew~ Finally, it's lunch break. Today's classes were so
boring.... That's right. Maybe I should eat lunch outside
for a change of pace."

"Hey, did you know? Suzuki apparently dislocated his
shoulder up until last week."

"Suzuki? You mean the guy who got suspended on his first day
after transferring? Dislocated his shoulder... What's he
been doing, skipping school?"

"That's the thing. Seems like he was at a bar in the next
town over. He slipped down the stairs there and got
injured."

"I saw Suzuki in the downtown area yesterday. When I talked
to him, he just started telling me about that incident."

"He said the bandages are off and he's completely healed
now, but I almost laughed when I thought, 'How do you
dislocate your shoulder at a bar?'"

"He's been hanging out in the next town, huh? That guy's bad
news. Let's stay away from him from now on."

Even though the whole place was wet from the sprinklers, I
never imagined someone could get injured on such a short
staircase. Maybe Suzuki is just an incredibly unlucky guy.

From what I heard, it seems his injury has healed, and I was
secretly relieved that it wasn't serious. But now that he's
healed, Suzuki might do something to Makoto again.

I decided to stay on guard just in case anything happens.
With that thought in mind, I finished my lunch and headed
back to the classroom for the afternoon classes.
